page.title: 18Entertainment - The Fair
page.content: When the fair comes to the village green (2 or 3 times a year),my friends Helen and Tanya call for me at about 6.30p.m.When we get there we meet the rest of our friends. When we arrive there aren't many people but it soon fills up. First of all we go on the{ { Waltzer.}The Waltzer is a circle of separate booths that spin around when the circle starts moving. Next we go on the{Umbrellas}which are seats that hang from the air and go round.Then we go on the{Dodgems}which are cars that hold two people and you try to dodge the other cars. Then we go on the { Mexican Hat}which is a lot of seats fixed onto each other in the shape of a mexican hat.This goes up and down and around. At about 9.30pm feeling sick and without any money left we go home.
